be near lvl 30.. correct?
>
> Dreven

> > Ya know, I agree with um...mstokes I believe (too lazy to scroll back
> > there) and I mentioned this before in my earlier post.. how about buying
> > yourself a goss robe? Its A/C is 8 and isn't a bad robe ... its white
and
> > looks good..albeit still a bathrobe look...you should be able to pick
one
> > up for some plat or go to befallen and head to third level and acquire
one
> > yourself.. :) its much more satisfying to be able to get one
> > yourself...really. OR invis and run through nek forest to lavastorm and
go
> > into the dungeon Najena and wait with the other throngs to try to get a
> > flowing black robe off Najena. Might be a fun challenge for you...it'll
> > just take some time is all....
